quotes.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
quotes.explanation: This quote emphasizes the importance of speaking with purpose and wisdom, rather than speaking out of compulsion.

quotes.text: At the touch of love, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.explanation: Plato highlights the transformative power of love, suggesting it brings out creativity and emotion in people.

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.explanation: Nietzsche explains that having a purpose or reason in life helps one endure hardships.

quotes.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.explanation: Nietzsche emphasizes the profound impact of music on human life and its essential role in our existence.

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.explanation: Marcus Aurelius asserts that our thoughts shape our happiness and overall life experience.

quotes.text: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.
quotes.explanation: This quote speaks to the ever-changing nature of the universe and the power of our thoughts in shaping our lives.

quotes.text: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.explanation: Jung speaks about personal agency and the ability to shape one's future despite past experiences.

quotes.text: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.explanation: Jung highlights the importance of understanding our own flaws and struggles to better empathize with others.
